title: News: John Maus Sets US tour dates
content:
In June, Synth pop mastermind John Maus released his album We Must Become the Pitiless Censors of Ourselves.

Now he has announced yet another tour across the vast American wasteland.

09-28 Chicago, IL – Empty Bottle
09-30 Toronto, Ontario – The Drake Hotel
10-02 Montreal, Quebec – Il Motore
10-03 Annandale-on-Hudson, NY – Bard College
10-04 Philadelphia, PA – Johnny Brenda’s
10-06 Oberlin, OH – Oberlin College
10-28-30 Asheville, NC – Moogfest

In other Maus news, have you seen the music video for latest album track ‘Head For The Country’? Directed by the mastermind behind the  Multinauts sci-fi saga Jennifer Juniper Stratford, the video sees John driving through snowy Minnesotan edgelands, communicating with space aliens at a mysterious radar base. An average day in the life of Maus.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d40
